alert.note: Alert for Dodge; Laurens; Montgomery; Treutlen; Wheeler (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 15 at 6:34PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Laurens, central Dodge, southwestern Treutlen, northwestern Wheeler and northwestern Montgomery Counties through 715 PM EDT... At 634 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was near Rentz, or 11 miles south of Dublin, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Eastman, Chester, Dexter, Cadwell, Rentz, Lothair, Plainfield, Landsburg, Cedar Grove, Godwinsville, Lowery, and Barnhill. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
